amendment.description: To require certain additional onshore oil and gas lease sales in certain states.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5409 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 291.

action.text: Amendment SA 5409 proposed by Senator Barrasso to Amendment SA 5194. (consideration: CR S4172; text: CR S4172) To require certain additional onshore oil and gas lease sales in certain states.
